mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, data.* from ( select m.* from following f, member m where f.flino = m.memno and f.memno=#{vo.memno}) data) where rnum>= (#{cri.pageNo}-1)*10+1 and rnum <= #{cri.pageNo}*10 order by id

select * from (select rownum rnum, data.* from ( select m.* from following f, member m where f.flino = m.memno and f.memno=#{vo.memno}) data) where rnum>= (#{cri.pageNo}-1)*10+1 and rnum <= #{cri.pageNo}*10 and UPPER(id) like UPPER('%'||#{cri.keyword}||'%') order by id
